title: Personalized e-Learning Design Utilizing Real-Time Learner Analytics Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital literacy and experience using LMS (Learning Management Systems)
context.additional_context: Process where practitioners master interface modification features of real-time analytical tools through project execution and incorporate learner engagement visualization into instructional design

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-time learner activity data using visualization tools based on interface variations
Learners can derive improvements for project-based learning design based on analytical results
Learners can diagnose learner engagement and develop personalized educational strategies using AI-based feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
